title: Minecraft PlayStation 4版 发布
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2014-9-10 16:35 编辑 


Update: 现已发布PS4版1.01更新以修复一些漏洞[sup]{来源请求}[/sup]


9月6日更新：PS4 版本已于全球发布。

Yeay! If you’re in Europe, you can download Minecraft for Playstation 4 right now. It’ll be available in the US very soon. Here are some questions and answers to celebrate!
耶！如果你在欧洲，你现在起可以下载 Minecraft Playstation 4 版本了！至于美国我们很快就会发布。为了庆祝这个喜庆事件，我们在这里发布一些问题及答案。
Yeay! Minecraft for Playstation 4 is available to download from PSN! Here are some questions and answers to celebrate!耶！Minecraft Playstation 4 版现在起可以从 PSN 市场下载。为了庆祝这个喜庆事件，我们在这里发布一些问题及答案。

I’ve bought Minecraft for my Playstation 3 but now I want it on my Playstation 4. Help me!
我曾经购买了 Minecraft Playstation 3 ，但是我现在想在 Playstation 4 里游玩。来帮帮我吧！

If you’ve bought Playstation 3 Edition digitally, or played online with the the disc version, you can upgrade to Playstation 4 Edition for just $4.99. Log into the PSN store to upgrade.如果你曾经购买 Playstation 3 数字版，或者使用光盘版游玩，你可以在 PSN 市场支付 $4.99 美金（大概30RMB） 升级为 Playstation 4 版本。

You can import your existing Playstation 3 worlds to Playstation 4 Edition. To do that you’ll need to load up Playstation 3 Edition, upload your world to the Magical Minecraft Cloud Land (not the official name), then re-download it from inside Playstation 4 Edition.你还可以导入你在 Playstation 3 的存档至你的 Playstation 4。如果你要将存档导入，你需要加载 Playstation 3 版本，把你的存档上传至 Magical Minecraft Cloud Land（不是官方名字），然后在 Playstation 4 版里重新下载。

All your existing Playstation 3 Edition DLC will work on Playstation 4 Edition.所有在 Playstation 3 的 DLC 也能在 Playstation 4 使用。

You can’t play cross-platform between Playstation 3 and Playstation 4. Sad but true.Playstation 3 版与 Playstation 4 版并不能一起游玩。虽然很可悲，但这是事实。

I’ve never played Minecraft on my Playstation 3. What Kreeper plox? Why are dig?
我从未在 Playstation 3 平台上游玩过 Minecraft。What Kreeper plox? Why are dig?

Minecraft for Playstation 4 will cost $19:99 from the PSN store.你可以于 PSN 商店购买 Minecraft Playstation 4 版，售价为 $19.99 美金（约122RMB）。

It’s a friendly and fun game that’s very popular with cool people across the world.
这是一个既友善，又有趣的全球著名游戏。

It features sheep, other animals, blocks, and tools. You can build cool stuff. You can go on adventures with friends. It’s really pretty if you catch it at the right time. You probably this by now, considering you’re on the Mojang blog.
将会添加羊，其他动物，方块和工具。你可以建造一些高大上的建筑。你可以与你的好基友一起冒险。如果你使用正确的方式游玩，你会感觉这个世界非常美妙。如果你现在有任何问题，你可以将其发布至我们的博客上。

Playstation 4 Edition features bigger worlds and an improved draw distance than the Playstation 3 version. If this doesn’t mean anything to you, don’t worry. Just load up Minecraft and have fun.Playstation 4 版的采用了更大的世界和改进的拉伸距离，比 Playstation 3 更加有乐趣。如果这些并不影响你，不用担心。加载 Minecraft 以及享受游戏即可！

What about Vita Edition? I want to play on my Vita.
那么说好的 Vita 版本呢？我想在我的 Vita 里游玩 Minecraft。

Minecraft: Playstation Vita Edition should be with us in a few weeks. As soon as we have a more accurate date we’ll let you know. Sorry for the delay. If you already own Minecraft: Playstation 3 Edition you get it for free.Minecraft Playstation Vita 版本预计在最近这几周发布。只要我们有准确的发布日期，我们会即时与大家发布。对于延误，我非常抱歉。如果你拥有 Minecraft Playstation 3，你可以免费游玩 Vita 版。

What about the Xbox One Version? When it that out? I’m extremely angry about this.
那么说好的 Xbox One 版本呢？它会在什么时候发布呢？如果延误了我会非常生气的！

Don’t be angry. Minecraft: Xbox One Edition will be out this Friday. Then you can play it until your fingers drop off. Sorry for the delay, but releasing a game for multiple consoles around the world during the same week is really hard.别生气。Minecraft Xbox One 将会于本周五（9月5日）发布。你可以一直玩直到你的手指断掉了。我对于延误感到非常抱歉，但同一星期在全球地区发布一个游戏是非常困难的。

That’s it for now! Enjoy Minecraft, and be nice to each other on the internet, yeah?
目前就这么多了！享受 Minecraft，以及在互联网上善待每一个人，对吧？

Owen – @bopogamel and the Mojangers
Owen – @bopogamel 以及 Mojang 的员工们
